tool_description: Searches and filters recipes from a comprehensive database based on dietary requirements, preferences, and constraints.

dietary_profile.description: Dietary profile ID from Dietary Profile Creator

meal_type.description: Type of meal: breakfast, lunch, dinner, snack, or dessert

cuisine_preference.description: Preferred cuisine type or 'any' for no preference

max_results.description: Maximum number of recipes to return (1-100)

error_messages: Invalid dietary profile: Profile ID not found or invalid format.
Invalid meal type: Must be one of [breakfast, lunch, dinner, snack, dessert].
Invalid prep time: Must be between 5 and 300 minutes.
Invalid max results: Must be between 1 and 100.
No recipes found: No recipes match the specified criteria. Try broadening your search parameters.
usage: Provide dietary_profile and meal_type as required parameters. Optionally specify max_prep_time, cuisine_preference, and max_results to refine the search.

recipe_names.description: List of recipe names corresponding to the IDs

prep_times.description: Preparation times in minutes for each recipe

difficulty_levels.description: Difficulty level for each recipe (easy, medium, hard)
